strengths: Miniaturization — structures can be transported by any ships (doesn't count against capacity)
Survival Instinct — reactively move 2 ships into a system an opponent activates
Linkship Destroyers trigger space cannon from carried structures — mobile PDS network
Start with 2 PDS — immediate defensive infrastructure
Signal Intrusion hero lets you 'unpass' at end of action phase with 2 extra command tokens
weaknesses: Transported structures cannot use abilities while in transit
Reactive movement is limited to 2 ships from adjacent systems
tips: Carry PDS on destroyers — they trigger space cannon from the structures, creating a mobile defense network
Survival Instinct lets you reinforce threatened systems reactively — opponents must account for this
Miniaturization lets you reposition space docks and PDS freely — build forward and retreat if needed
Hero (Signal Intrusion) is game-changing: unpass late to take key actions while others watch
Choose 1 red or green starting tech — adapt to table composition
Nanomachines tech lets you place free PDS, repair all units, and cycle action cards
Promissory note lets allies move your structures — use for diplomatic leverage
